title: You Can Ask Him
body:
You Can Ask Him

"You are saying he is working for the dark guild?" a tall bulky looking man asked while looking at Evan with sharp eyes.

"I am not sure, but the dark guild has been very active lately so we can't rule out this possibility," said Alan, still looking at Evan who standing with the same indifferent expression on his face.

Edward wanted to say something but stopped when he saw Nathan shaking his head.

After hearing Alan, most of the people present in the room looked at Evan with suspicious-filled eyes.

"If you don't have any proof that you don't have any connection with that golden lightning then you will have to come with me to the Hunters' Association for a proper investigation," Alan said to Evan and waited for his response.

Evan didn't say anything for a long time after listening to Alan and just kept looking at him with the same expressionless face.
